snippet: A new advocacy group debases the presidency by trolling for unlimited corporate money.
abstract: Editorial contends that Organizing for Action, groups that is direct descendant of Obama for America, Pres Obama's campaign organization, debases Obama by attempting to take advantage of lax campaign finance regulations; calls on group to refuse corporate donations and limited donations to a few hundred dollars.
lead_paragraph: A new advocacy group debases the presidency by trolling for unlimited corporate money.

headline.seo: The White House Joins the Cash Grab
headline.main: The White House Joins the Cash Grab
headline.print_headline: The White House Joins the Cash Grab
